src_text: Dr. Ehud Ur, em i wanpela profesa bilong marasin long Dalhousie University long Halifax, long Nova Scotia na em i siaman sains na klinik seksen bilong Canadian Diabetes Association i givim tok lukaut olsem dispela risets i nupela yet.

src_text: Planti bilong ol tingting long mining bilong 'technological determinism' i gat tupela bikpela tingting insait long ol: wanpela em i olsem divelopmen bilong teknoloji i bihainim wanpela rot we kalsa na politiks i no inap long senisim, na narapela em i olsem teknoloji i kamapim "senis" long ol komuniti bikos dispela ol pasin na tingting em ol manmeri i bon wantaim na teknoloji i no kamapim.
ref_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
